22-035TI.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes from the Technology & Page 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMWEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 21, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHTECHNOLOGY AND INNOVATION COMMISSION MINUTESInnovation Commission meeting held Wednesday, October 26, 2022.A motion was made by Chair Shaffer, seconded by Commissioner Vinzant, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lisa Mae Brunson, Jonathan de Armas, Justin Hectus, Javier Ortiz, Parisa Vinzant, Gwen Shaffer and Robb Korinke2.
